sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time>1970-01-01 00:15:00</cook_time> <cooking_instructions>1. Cook quinoa according to package instructions and let it cool. 2. Chop cucumber, cherry tomatoes, bell pepper, and red onion. 3. In a large bowl, combine cooked quinoa, chopped vegetables, crumbled feta cheese, and pitted kalamata olives. 4. In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, minced garlic, salt, and pepper to make the dressing. 5. Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to combine. 6. Garnish with chopped parsley and serve.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Global">eb81cf979755021069a3b6fce053af07</cuisine> <diet>bca1c6979711021069a3b6fce053af90</diet> <effort display_value="Easy">fae0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients>Quinoa (1 cup, cooked), Cucumber (1), Ch</ingredients> <meal_type display_value="Lunch">617596df9751021069a3b6fce053af66</meal_type> <name>Quinoa Salad</name> <nutrition>Calories: 350, Protein: 15g, Fat: 20g, Carbs: 35g</nutrition> <owned_by display_value="MP Admin">cbb877e697b0021069a3b6fce053af41</owned_by> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Cook quinoa and let it cool. 2. Chop vegetables. 3. Crumble feta cheese.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time>1970-01-01 00:15:00</prep_time> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:00:29</sys_created_on> <sys_id>3cac87979795021069a3b6fce053afa4</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-05-01 06:39:10</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
